name: Rules
text:
The director may make, amend, or repeal such rules pursuant to chapter 91, as may be deemed proper to effectuate this chapter. [L 1981, c 30, §4 superseded by c 54, §4]
    [Section effective July 1, 2005.  For section effective until June 30, 2005, see above.]  The attorney general may make, amend, or repeal such rules pursuant to chapter 91, as may be deemed proper to effectuate this chapter. [L 1981, c 30, §4 as superseded by c 54, §4; am L 2004, c 93, §13]
